# How Long Should a Cold Email Be?

URL: https://howlongshouldacoldemailbe.com
Description: The optimal cold email is 50–125 words. Emails in this range get 2.4x higher reply rates than emails over 200 words. One clear ask, no fluff.

## Quick Answer

The optimal cold email is 50–125 words. Emails in this range get 2.4x higher reply rates than emails over 200 words. One clear ask, no fluff.
